breadcrumbs.sql: select (select c_start_dt from c where c_id=@c_parent_id) parent_start_dt

lov.sql: select c_id codeval,c_name codetxt from c order by c_name

default.sql: select c_name||' :: Child' from c where c_id = @c_parent_id

fields.name: c_start_dt
fields.caption: Start Date
fields.default: js:(function(){ var rslt = new Date(); var parent_start_dt = data && data._bcrumbs && data._bcrumbs.parent_start_dt && new Date(data._bcrumbs.parent_start_dt); if(rslt > parent_start_dt) rslt = parent_start_dt; debugger; return rslt; })()
